languages.text: {n}Скривившись, мятежник рычит:{/n} "Если бы ты понимал{mf||а}, что говоришь... Да, моя плоть проклята несовершенством, моя кровь несет в себе убожество, и я мог бы быть... Но ты не поймешь, худокровн{mf|ый|ая}". {n}Ствол оружия Немезита вздрагивает, но разъяренный мятежник не замечает этого.{/n}

{n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Скривившись, мятежник рычит:{/n} "Если бы ты понимал{mf||а}, что говоришь... Да, моя плоть проклята несовершенством, моя кровь несет в себе убожество, и я мог бы быть... Но ты не поймешь, худокровн{mf|ый|ая}". {n}Ствол оружия Немезита вздрагивает, но разъяренный мятежник не замечает этого.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and growls:{/n} "If only you knew what you are saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, and I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of the Nemesite's weapon wobbles, but the enraged rebel does not notice it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nemesit verzieht das Gesicht und faucht:{/n} "Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, was Ihr sagt ... Ja, mein Fleisch ist mit Makeln verflucht, mein Blut enthält Verkommenheit, denn ich könnte ... Aber das würdet Ihr nicht verstehen mit Eurem stinkenden Blut." {n}Der Lauf von Nemesits Waffe zittert, aber sein aufgebrachter Geist bemerkt es nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesit verzieht das Gesicht und faucht´:{/n} "Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, was Ihr sagt ... Ja, mein Fleisch ist mit Makeln verflucht, mein Blut enthält Verkommenheit, denn ich könnte ... Aber das würdet Ihr nicht verstehen mit Eurem stinkenden Blut." {n}Der Lauf von Nemesits Waffe zittert, aber sein aufgebrachter Geist bemerkt es nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nemesitio hace una mueca y escupe entre dientes:{/n} «Si tuvieras una idea de lo que estás diciendo... Sí, mi carne está maldita por la imperfección, mi sangre lleva la miseria, pues podría ser... Pero tú no lo entenderías, con tu sangre mancillada». {n}El cañón del arma de Nemesitio tiembla, pero su mente enardecida no se da cuenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemesitio hace una mueca y escupe entre dientes:{/n} «Si tuvieras una idea de lo que estás diciendo... Pero tú no lo entenderías, con tu sangre mancillada». {n}El cañón del arma de Nemesitio tiembla, pero su mente enardecida no se da cuenta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ネメサイトは口角を上げて吠える。{/n}「何を言ってるか分かっているのか…そうだ、この肉は欠陥に呪われ、この血には惨めさが流れる…それも全ては…だが、お前には理解できないだろう、汚れた血の者よ」{n}ネメサイトの銃身が震えるが、男の憤激した心はそれに気づかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ネメサイトは口角を上げて吠える。{/n}「何を言ってるか分かっているのか…そうだ、この肉は欠陥に呪われ、この血には惨めさが流れる…それも全ては…だが、お前には理解できないだろう、汚れた血の者よ」{n}ネメサイトの銃身が震えるが、男の憤激した心はそれに気づかない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}涅墨斯特露出了痛苦的表情，咆哮起来。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说什么胡话……没错，我的肉体确实受到了瑕疵的诅咒，我的血脉中流淌着痛苦，因为我可能会……但你根本不会明白，你这个流着污秽之血的家伙。”{n}涅墨斯特手里的武器抖了起来，但他愤怒的头脑根本没留意到这一点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨斯特露出了痛苦的表情，咆哮起来。{/n}“你根本不知道你在说什么胡话……没错，我的肉体确实受到了瑕疵的诅咒，我的血脉中流淌着痛苦，因为我可能会……但你根本不会明白，你这个流着污秽之血的家伙。”{n}涅墨斯特手里的武器抖了起来，但他愤怒的头脑根本没留意到这一点。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Némésite grimace et grogne :{/n} « Si seulement vous mesuriez la portée de vos propos... Oui, ma chair est frappée d'imperfection et mon sang véhicule une impureté, et pourtant, je pourrais être... Mais vous ne comprendriez pas, vous dont le sang me répugne. » {n}Le canon de l'arme de Némésite se met à trembler sans que son esprit enflammé ne le remarque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Némésite grimace et grogne :{/n} « Si seulement vous mesuriez la portée de vos propos... Oui, ma chair est frappée d'imperfection et mon sang véhicule une impureté, et pourtant, je pourrais être... Mais vous ne comprendriez pas, vous dont le sang me répugne. » {n}Le canon de l'arme de Némésite se met à trembler sans que son esprit enflammé ne le remarque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nemezit, yüzünü ekşitip homurdanıyor.{/n} "Keşke ağzından çıkanı kulağın duysa... Etim kusurlarla lanetlenmiş, kanım sefaletle akıyor çünkü ben... Gerçi senin gibi habis ruhlu biri bunu anlayamaz..." {n}Nemezit'in silahının namlusu sarsılıyor. Öfkeyle köpüren zihni ise bunun farkına varmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Nemesite grimaces and snarls,{/n} "If only you knew what you were saying... Yes, my flesh is cursed with imperfection, my blood carries wretchedness, for I could be... But you would not understand, foul-blooded one." {n}The barrel of Nemesite's weapon shakes, but his incensed mind does not notice.{/n}
